titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral of Her late Majesty Queen Mary of ever blessed memory in the abbey-church in Westminster upon March 5, 1694/5 by His Grace Thomas Lord Archibishop of Canterbury.
titleStmt.author: Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.
